name: Lock's Quest
description: Build Defenses and Battle against the Clockwork horde in this 2D Action RPG / Tower Defense hybrid. Experience a gripping story, which unfolds as you progress through 75 Days of warfare, aided by a collection of turrets, traps and special attacks.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 Ghz or above Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.7 Ghz or above Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 2 GB available space
